name: Blast Factor - Multiplayer Pack
summary:
Co-Op Mode: Up to four players can share a single co-op score and play as teammates. Try to beat the standard set of levels together and post a co-op high score to the leaderboards. Work together to avoid collisions and knocking into enemies and amplify your moves into larger and more forceful effects.


Grudge Match: Allows up to four players to battle against each other in a fight for survival. Players can hit each other with the Repulsor causing their ship to be pushed away by the force just like an enemy.

Accelerated Time: Players can now play the game with up to 150% speed increase. With higher risks come higher rewards. How far can you push your score?
